channel.title: A Batch File for Server Restarter
channel.description: Anyone know the code to restart my server every 30 minutes incase of lag/glitch/player can't connect...I need it for my server..because people play when I sleep...so if anyone would be kind enough to make me a batch file to delete runserver.bat and to open it again...i would be thankfull..Thanks.

item.title: A Batch File for Server Restarter
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

hmm sum1 made one that uses the file taskkill in system32 folder, when the timer was up it wud reset the server… but antilag.java also does that doesnt it?

Read full topic
item.source: A Batch File for Server Restarter
